summary: When an abused heiress grows to giant size because of her encounter with aliens, she decides to get revenge on her cheating husband and those who annoyed her.
cast: Daryl Hannah|Daniel Baldwin|William Windom|Frances Fisher|Cristi Conaway|Paul Benedict|O'Neal Compton|Victoria Haas|Lewis Arquette|Kye Benson|Xander Berkeley|Linda Bisesti|Hamilton Camp|Ben Cleaveland|Richard Edson|George Gerdes|Dru Mouser|Stephen Rowe|Edmund L. Shaff|Hilary Shepard|Hank Stratton|Berta Waagfjord|Barry Watson|Scott Williamson|Maud Winchester|Christopher Bunyan
title: El ataque de la mujer de 50 pies
